TopicTitle: Merge my ksp install to my steam account?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I installed ksp independently (Linux run-in-place) and I recently got steam.

could I get ksp on steam now for free, or move my ksp into steam somehow?

Edited November 5, 2014 by kerbingamer376
I'm afraid not. Stand-alone to Steam transfers were only available to those who purchased the game prior to being released on Steam.

If you bought the game before a Steam version was available then you can log into your KSP store account and transfer the purchase, for example this is my store copy of KSP: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0p3vjfl7x9t089p/transferpurchase.png?dl=0

If you don't see that button then it's not possible to transfer your purchase to Steam because you bought it after KSP was released on Steam.
